content: Is there a specific reason why message timestamps are displayed on the right side as opposed to the left side as it usually seems to be in say IRC or other chat applications? Is there any way to adjust this? If not, can we consider creating a personal setting for adjusting this positioning?

@shrizza we are in the middle of redesign. Once it is finished we could review how it is working overall.
Top right corner was available to place the date. I don't see the place for a date or time on the left side. Where would you put it?
Right now the data and time is displayed on the right side at all times for consistency.
Hm, OK. Thanks for bringing up the alignment of time and date. The positioning makes more sense now and I do agree that this alignment is ideal.

That said, I think the right column works very nicely, in part because it keeps them in a visually separate space from the avatars on the left. IRC has different design constraints, since it doesn't have avatars.
